name: Name
aboutMeContent: Senior developer with over 11 years of experience in technologies such as Java, Spring, TypeScript, Kafka, MySQL, PostgreSQL, and Dart. Expert in microservices architecture and scalable system development. Passionate about creating innovative solutions, I have worked on challenging projects, from high-performance systems to modern mobile applications and online payment system integrations.
PublicTransportTicketSalesAndPurchaseSys: Mobile application developed in Flutter to facilitate buying and selling public transport tickets. Integration with payment APIs and real-time notifications.
projectsDescription: Projects that demonstrate technical expertise and innovation
digitalWalletDescription: Digital wallet system for secure and fast transactions, with integration to banks and cryptocurrencies. Developed with microservices architecture using Spring Boot.
microservicesPlatformDescription: System for managing and monitoring microservices, with integration to Docker and Kubernetes.
energyPlatform: Home Energy Consumption and Management Platform
energyPlatformDescription: System for managing and monitoring electricity consumption. (Async Energy)
sgdeaDescription: Modern and intuitive system for complete management of customs Single Declarations, developed to optimize processes and ensure compliance with current regulations.
